item.title: Converting VirtualBox OVA to VMware Compatible OVF
item.description: This guide use the possible freeware tools to perform the conversion. Conversion Need? Virtualbox does not generate Vmware Cloud/Vmware ESXi compatible OVA/OVF files Tools Required Vmware Player ovftool ** VMware account needed to download (free to signup) ** Conversion Process Step 1: Export the VM as OVA from virtualbox Step 2: Import the OVA on to installed VMware player. When prompted to retry/cancel, proceed with retry importing, ignoring the warning messages any.
